name: Early Childhood Program
description: The Early Childhood Center, aka the Treehouse, features preschool & TK classrooms, a makerspace and art studio, a courtyard for outdoor and messy play, and a rooftop playground just for our youngest learners. Each preschool class has Spanish-speaking teacher who integrates common Spanish expressions into the day, including during routines, reading, songs, and work time.

howToGetIt: Tours are a required step of our application process and a great way to learn more about our school. To schedule a tour, visit Online RESERVATION or Contact staff at admissions@cds-sf.org. Application process requires prior approval before using ONLINE LINK
cost: This is a fee based service.
